channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 23:14 Auxiliary in Zaporizhzhia and Zaporizhzhya Territorial Community. Solve for further reports.
item.description: 游릭 23:14 Auxiliary in Zaporizhzhia and Zaporizhzhya Territorial Community. Solve for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 21:57 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community, Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivsk Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 21:57 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community, Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivsk Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
